member.name: M:RestWrapper.ContentTypeParser.ExtractMediaType(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a Content-Type header and extracts the media type.
member.returns: The media type portion of the Content-Type header (e.g., "text/html").

member.name: M:RestWrapper.ContentTypeParser.ExtractCharset(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the character set from a Content-Type header value.
member.returns: The character set or null if not specified (e.g., "charset=utf-8").

member.name: M:RestWrapper.ContentTypeParser.ExtractBoundary(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the boundary parameter from a Content-Type header value.
member.returns: The boundary value or null if not specified.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.ContentTypeParser.ExtractParameters(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts all parameters from a Content-Type header value.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.ContentTypeParser.ExtractParameter(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Extracts a specific parameter from a Content-Type header.
member.param: The name of the parameter to extract.
member.returns: The parameter value or null if not found.

member.name: T:RestWrapper.RestRequest
member.summary: RESTful HTTP request to be sent to a server. Encapsulate this object in a using block.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Logger
member.summary: Method to invoke when sending log messages.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Timestamp
member.summary: UTC timestamp from the request.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Method
member.summary: The HTTP method to use, also known as a verb (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, etc).

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Url
member.summary: The URL to which the request should be directed.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Authorization
member.summary: Authorization header parameters.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.IgnoreCertificateErrors
member.summary: Ignore certificate errors such as expired certificates, self-signed certificates, or those that cannot be validated.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.CertificateFilename
member.summary: The filename of the file containing the certificate.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.CertificatePassword
member.summary: The password to the certificate file.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Query
member.summary: The query elements attached to the URL.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.Headers
member.summary: The HTTP headers to attach to the request.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.ContentType
member.summary: The content type of the payload (i.e. Data or DataStream).

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.ContentLength
member.summary: The content length of the payload (i.e. Data or DataStream).

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.ChunkedTransfer
member.summary: Boolean indicating if chunked transfer encoding is in use.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.BufferSize
member.summary: The size of the buffer to use while reading from the DataStream and the response stream from the server.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.TimeoutMilliseconds
member.summary: The number of milliseconds to wait before assuming the request has timed out.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.UserAgent
member.summary: The user agent header to set on outbound requests.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestRequest.AllowAutoRedirect
member.summary: Enable or disable support for automatically handling redirects.

member.summary: Creates a human-readable string of the object.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with no data.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request using form-encoded data. This method will automatically set the content-type header.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: A string containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync(System.Byte[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: A byte array containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendAsync(System.Int64,System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send the HTTP request with the supplied data.
member.param: The number of bytes to read from the input stream.
A stream containing the data you wish to send to the server (does not work with GET requests).

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendChunkAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send a chunk of data. A RestResponse object will only be returned when isFinal is set to true.
member.param: Boolean indicating if this is the final chunk.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestRequest.SendChunkAsync(System.Byte[],System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send a chunk of data. A RestResponse object will only be returned when isFinal is set to true.
member.param: Boolean indicating if this is the final chunk.

member.name: T:RestWrapper.RestResponse
member.summary: RESTful response from the server. Encapsulate this object in a using block.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.Time
member.summary: Information related to the start, end, and total time for the operation.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: The protocol and version.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.Headers
member.summary: User-supplied headers.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ContentEncoding
member.summary: The content encoding returned from the server.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ContentType
member.summary: The content type returned from the server.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.CharacterSet
member.summary: The character set used in the encoding.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ContentLength
member.summary: The number of bytes contained in the response body byte array.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ChunkedTransferEncoding
member.summary: Boolean indicating if chunked transfer encoding is being used.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ServerSentEvents
member.summary: Boolean indicating if server-sent events are being used.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: The HTTP status code returned with the response.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.IsSuccessStatusCode
member.summary: Boolean indicating if the status code indicates success.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.StatusDescription
member.summary: The HTTP status description associated with the HTTP status code.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.Data
member.summary: The stream containing the response data returned from the server.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.DataAsBytes
member.summary: Read the data stream fully into a byte array. If you use this property, the 'Data' property will be fully read.

member.name: P:RestWrapper.RestResponse.DataAsString
member.summary: Read the data stream fully into a string. If you use this property, the 'Data' property will be fully read.

member.summary: JSON serialization helper.

member.summary: RESTful response from the server. Encapsulate this object in a using block.

member.summary: Dispose.

member.summary: Creates a human-readable string of the object.

member.summary: Deserialize JSON data to an object type of your choosing.

member.name: M:RestWrapper.RestResponse.ReadEventAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Read the next server-sent event. Only appropriate for responses where ServerSentEvents is true.

member.summary: Read the next chunk. Only appropriate for responses where ChunkedTransferEncoding is true.
member.returns: Chunk data, or null if called after the final chunk.
